title: Net income of Marriott International worldwide 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: The Marriott International Company reported total Net of about 1273 million U.S. dollars in 2019 .
Total Net comprises automotive Net , credit Net , and other Net .

The Marriott International Company 's Net In 2008 , when the global economy tumbled into recession , the CEOs of all Big Three US automakers flew into Washington DC to plead for emergency government aid .
gold: Global hotel giant Marriot International accounted for a net income of approximately 1.27 billion U.S. dollars in 2019 , down from the previous year 's total of 1.91 billion U.S. dollars.
A global player in the hotel industry With nearly seven thousand hotels around the world , Marriot International was one of the largest hotel chains worldwide in 2019.
It also ranked ahead of other large hotel chains such as Hilton Worldwide , Hyatt Hotel , and Host Hotels & Resorts in terms of revenue in 2018 .
